verbs.description: [ARG0: red sox] erase 4-run deficit [V: take] [ARG1: control of world series] [ARGM-MNR: with 9 - 6 win over dodgers in game 4] steve pearce hit a tying homer in the eighth inning and a three - run double in the ninth and the boston red sox rallied from a four - run deficit for a 9 - 6 win over the los angeles dodgers on saturday night and a 3 - 1 world series lead dodgers los angeles dodgers boston red sox steve pearce red sox world series
